# Regulatory dates {#regdates}



```{r kanzig-reg, warning=FALSE}

readxl::read_xlsx('data/kaenzig_reg_dates.xlsx') %>% 
  kableExtra::kbl(caption = 'Regulatory dates from the research of \\citet{kaenzig2022}', 
               booktabs = TRUE,
               longtable = TRUE) %>%
  kableExtra::column_spec(2, width = "35em") %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(position = "left",
                            latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header", "scale_down"), 
                            full_width = F,
                            font_size = 10)

```


```{r my-reg, warning=FALSE}

readxl::read_xlsx('data/my_reg_dates.xlsx') %>% 
  kableExtra::kbl(caption = 'Regulatory dates found using similar methodology as \\citet{kaenzig2022} did.', 
               booktabs = TRUE,
               longtable = TRUE) %>%
  kableExtra::column_spec(2, width = "35em") %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(position = "left",
                            latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header", "scale_down"), 
                            full_width = F,
                            font_size = 10)

```
